descriptionHtml:
THE ELDER SCROLL V 

S K Y R I M


Better Smoke Textures
=====================

Version 1.1
- lighter alpha


Installation
------------
Extract the content of the \"textures\" folder into the \"Data\" folder. If you have previous versions installed, just replace all files with the new ones.

The new textures are : 
Data\\textures\\effects\\fxsmokesoftsub.dds
Data\\textures\\effects\\fxsmokesoftsub01.dds
Data\\textures\\effects\\smokeparticles01.dds

Usage
-----
Do as you please.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
author: canguilhem
